title: Divide and Conquer Optimization (DP)
subtitle: Optimize DP of form dp[i][j] = min(dp[k][j-1] + cost(k+1, i))
time_complexity: O(N log N) per DP layer
code: def dc_opt(dp_prev, dp_curr, cost, l, r, optl, optr):
for k in range(optl, min(mid, optr)+1):
dc_opt(dp_prev, dp_curr, cost, l, mid-1, optl, best[0])
dc_opt(dp_prev, dp_curr, cost, mid+1, r, best[0], optr)
additional_information: Divide and Conquer Optimization reduces DP computation when the cost function is convex in certain ways.
